title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the East India Company, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the East India Company, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Jon Wilson responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the trading company that went on to become an agent of British imperialism in India during the 18th and 19th centuries. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, historian Jon Wilson responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about the English trading company that went on to become an agent of British imperialism in India during the 18th and 19th centuries. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
